# adDescription

**Instance Property**

A human-readable description of the ad.

## Declaration

```swift
var adDescription: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is not used.

## Describing ads

- **adType**: The type of the ad.
- **adPurchaserName**: The name of the entity that purchased the ad.

items.description: The name of the entity that purchased the ad.
items.name: adPurchaserName
